name: Website@School
summary: Website CMS for schools and IT education
short_description: Website@School is a Content Management System (CMS) specially designed for schools and IT education. Main features: easy, excellent documentation, unlimited number of sites and intranets, real time collaborative editing (mid 2013), learn web IT and management, can be managed by blind users with braille terminal and screen reader, international collaboration in a safe environment, avable in English, Spanish, Chinese, Dutch, French,  Portugese, Polish, Swedish, Finnish, German, Greek, Turkish, Arabic, Persian, Danish, Hungarian and more to follow. Please visit www.websiteatschool.eu
